entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benign exception in `KestrelServerImpl.BindAsync` when running a default .NET 7 website on Azure App Service (linux) #47915
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #47912
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #47911
  • IWebHostEnvironment does not return the appropriate physical path when debugging #47909
  • Benchmark and improve shared `RequestDelegateCreation` test infrastructure #47907
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor SSR form post handling: improve error handling consistency #47903
    .NET 8 Planning
  • CascadingModelBinder: remove the IsFixed parameter #47902
    8.0-preview5
  • [Question] How to find problem in our code leading to concurrent usage of HttpContext ? #47900
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47899
  • Perf improvement: caching #47898
  • Simplify baseline tests for RDG #47897

Closed

  • [Blazor WSAM .NET 7.0] Visual Studio Debugger Cannot Attach to Microsoft Edge with Window Authentication Enabled #47913
  • Should AllowedHosts be in the template appsettings.json? #47862
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47891
  • how to run your Blazor project on IIS #47843
  • [Blazor] SetUpdatesAttributeName #47877
  • [QuickGrid] ColumnBase align check uses incorrect logical operator. #47857
    8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Router seems to be rendering twice #47058
    8.0-preview5
  • Honor default value provided in parameters for route handlers #47266
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #47892

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-preview4] RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47916
    area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47910
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [blazor] Drop explicit change of extension of assembly to lazy load #47905
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4

Merged

  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • [GenerateEmbeddedResourcesManifest] handle Items with empty LogicalName #29306 #47887
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, 8.0-preview5
  • Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47908
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixing wrong condition in QuickGrid column header rendering #47886
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixed Router renders component twice #47880
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Replace ISystemClock in SignalR #47895
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview5
  • [blazor] Drop explicit change of extension of assembly to lazy load #47901
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • Update branding to preview5 #47890
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Enable prebuilt detection #47894
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2168094 #47784
    area-mvc
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
